I had the pleasure of working with Ian for 2 years while at Apex Systems, Inc.  As a specialty recruiter (Java/J2EE) he was challenged with an extremely niche skill set, however he consistently utilized creative recruiting strategies and made a habit of thinking "outside the box" in order to locate new candidates and maintain a strong candidate pipeline for Java/J2EE positions.  Ian has an amazing talent for relationship building and kept a long list of candidates that were committed to Apex only because of their relationship and success while working with him.  Ian is incredibly dedicated and reliable,  and I would highly recommend him to any future client or employer!

summary: Ian McNab is a Senior Applications Recruiter and Team Lead with 9 + years of combined experience in recruiting and sales experience.Apex Systems, an On Assignment company (NYSE: ASGN), provides organizations with scalable IT staffing solutions to address critical gaps in their current workforce and augment workforce management strategies. We specialize in providing IT professionals for contract, contract-to-hire, direct placement, and managed solutions to clients in Fortune 500, mid-market, and emerging companies. Our specialized technology and industry practice groups help us match the most talented and qualified technical professionals to great companies across the country.Apex and parent company On Assignment combine to be the 2nd largest IT staffing and services firm in the U.S. Apex was named to Inavero's Best of Staffing Client lists in 2012 and 2013. Join our Talent Network/Job Portal via it careers.apexsystemsinc.com to sign up to receive job alerts that match your criteria.At Apex Systems, we take pride in offering best in class customer service along with unmatched industry knowledge. Our goal is to act as a business partner and assist our clients in building and maintaining a successful IT Department. We take time to understand our client's vision, challenges and goals; thus, helping them to tailor an appropriate staffing model to achieve high performance.Please call me at 704-970-1786 to learn about any of our open positions, or for us to discover what your perfect job looks like so that we can seek it out.Specialties: Applications Recruiting/Staffing, Client/Vendor Relationships, Full Life Cycle Recruiting, Candidate Technical Screening, Interviews, Resumes, Reference Checks, Java, .Net, BizTalk, Genesys, UCCE, eGain, Telephony, Contact Center, Ruby, PHP, Perl, JavaScript, SQL, Oracle, DB2, Developers, Architects, QA, Finance, Database Developers, DBA, Data Analysts and more!
name: Ian McNabb
title: Team Lead / Senior Professional Recruiter at Apex Systems
